The best Amazon deals of the day

1. A 26% markdown: This best-selling hair styling tool  

Creating salon-quality hair styles has never been easier with the Revlon detachable One-Step hair dryer and volumizer plus. This cult-favorite hair tool is an upgraded version of one of our favorites (the Revlon One-Step hair dryer and volumizer hot air brush) and right now, you can pick it up from Amazon for as little as $52, a $17.99 markdown. The volumizer plus has many of the same features of the original volumizer—which dried our locks from root to tip with minimal effort—but has a slimmer design and a detachable barrel. This beauty tool could be an especially great buy for those who want to protect their locks when styling since, "it has a new medium heat setting that seems to have the same amount of airflow as the high, but at a lower temperature," according to Reviewed beauty editor Jessica Kasparian. 

Get the Revlon Detachable One-Step Hair Dryer and Volumizer Plus from $52 (Save $17.99)

2. Up to 30% off: This popular line of Amazon TVs

Give your home's media room a major visual upgrade with an Amazon Fire TV. Right now you can shop the Omni series for as much as 30% off at Amazon. For instance, you can take home the 50-inch Amazon Fire Omni series 4K UHD smart TV for just $364.99—$145 off the full $509.99 list price. While we weren't thrilled with the TV's picture performance in testing, we found the TV to be easy to set up and were impressed with its Alexa integration. If you're looking for the latest device to connect to your Alexa, this TV fits the bill. 

Save up to 30% on Amazon Fire TV Omni Series

3. 40% down: This customer-favorite pet brush

Keep your pet's fur silky smooth with the Hertzko self-cleaning slicker brush, down from $29.99 to just $17.99 right now. An Amazon customer-favorite, this brush can be used on both dogs and cats to gently remove matted fur, tangles and dander. Made with retractable bristles for easy cleaning, the best-selling brush is designed to groom your pet's undercoat without scratching or irritating their skin. 

Get the Hertzko Self-Cleaning Slicker Brush for Dogs and Cats for $17.99 (Save $12)

4. Under $25: This cold brew coffee maker 

Skip the Starbucks line and make fresh and flavorful cups of cold brew from home with the Takeya two-quart deluxe cold brew coffee maker. According to the brand, the brewer makes less acidic coffee than traditional machines and has the capacity to make four servings at once. Better still, the pitcher can also withstand heat, so you can use it to make cold or hot cups of joe. Usually retailing at $34.99, you can take home the top-rated coffee maker for as little as $23.40 today, after a 33% price cut. 

Get the Takeya Two-Quart Deluxe Cold Brew Coffee Maker from $23.40 (Save $10.99 to $13)

5. Save $40: This top-tier trimmer 

Keep your stubble in check with the Philips Norelco Shaver 9100 on sale at Amazon today. Normally priced at $149.95, this cordless electric trimmer is now listed for $109.95 thanks to a 27% discount. Philips says the shaver features V-Track Precision Blades in its heads that move in eight directions to catch hair along every curve of your face. The brand also promises 50 minutes of cordless shaving on each charge—and a battery that's ready to go after just one hour of charging.

Get the Philips Norelco Shaver 9100 for $109.95 (Save $40)

The best Amazon deals from this week

1. Corsair HS60 Pro Gaming Headset

Stay immersed in your favorite video games with the Corsair HS60 Pro headset. Typically listed for $69.99, this wired gaming sound device is on sale in its Carbon black color for 43% off, or $39.99. Corsair says the HS60 Pro offers 7.1 Surround Sound audio through adjustable cups fitted with plush memory foam, so you can have a soft feel over your ears for even the longest streaming sessions. The headset is compatible not only with PCs, but also the latest consoles from Sony, Microsoft and Nintendo, and has a detachable noise-canceling unidirectional microphone so you can chat while gaming.

Get the Corsair HS60 Pro Gaming Headset from $39.99 (Save $30)

2. iRobot Roomba i3+

We love Roombas for their top-shelf performance, and right now, one of our favorites is more than 33% off. The iRobot Roomba i3+, usually priced at $599.99, is now available for $399. This robot vacuum is our favorite affordable Roomba for the self-emptying feature that collects dirt in the accompanying dirt tower. In our testing, we found the i3+ picked up an average of 11 grams of dirt per run, which is on par with our favorite robot vacuum, the iRobot Roomba i7+ ($746). 

Get the iRobot Roomba i3+ for $399 (Save $200.99)

3. Chamberlain myQ Smart Garage Hub and Sensor

Control your home garage even when you're not home with the Chamberlain myQ smart garage hub. Typically listed for $29.98, this compact smart home device can be yours for $19.98, or $10 off. Chamberlain says the myQ lets you open and close your garage door from a dedicated app available for iPhones and Android smartphones. You can also schedule specific times for your garage to open and close with real-time notifications sent to your phone.

Get the Chamberlain myQ Smart Garage Hub and Sensor for $19.98 (Save $10)

4. BalanceFrom 40-Pound All-Purpose Weight Set

Build some major body strength this year with this BalanceFrom 40-pound weight set on sale at Amazon today. Typically listed for $45.64, you can get this pair of vinyl-coated dumbbells for 49% off at $23.39. The brand says the fitness tools come with four collar locks to help keep the provided weights secure no matter how tough your home fitness routine is. The vinyl coating is also meant to keep the weights from rusting over time. 

Get the BalanceFrom 40-Pound All-Purpose Weight Set for $23.39 (Save $22.25)

5. Bodum Melior Gooseneck Electric Water Kettle

If you're looking for a faster way to make your morning tea, consider the Bodum Melior gooseneck electric water kettle. This customer-favorite kettle features a sleek stainless steel design, a convenient cork handle and a handy heat indicator light. Better still, the 27-ounce kettle boils water with just the push of a button and easily detaches from the base for an easy pour. Usually ringing up for $34.99, you can take home the popular kitchen tool today for as little as $26.99—a 23% markdown. 

Get the Bodum Melior Gooseneck Electric Water Kettle from $26.99 (Save $8)
